Question: This person provided Grant with more troops and mobilized his party to renew its support of Grant in the war effort.
Hints: Taney issued the writ, thereby ordering Merryman's release, but this person ignored it.
This person averted British recognition of the Confederacy by skillfully handling the Trent affair in late 1861.
This person's appointments were designed to keep both the moderate and Radical factions in harness.
